climate.message: All plants compatible with Tier 3 (Humid Temperate)

benefits.title: High Phylogenetic Diversity
benefits.detail: Distant relatives typically share fewer pests and pathogens, reducing disease spread in the guild.

benefits.title: Natural Insect Pest Control
benefits.message: Guild provides insect pest control via 5 biocontrol mechanisms
benefits.detail: Plants attract beneficial insects (predators and parasitoids) that naturally suppress pest populations.

benefits.title: Natural Disease Suppression
benefits.message: Guild provides disease suppression via 6 antagonistic fungal mechanisms
benefits.detail: Plants harbor beneficial fungi that antagonize pathogens, reducing disease incidence through biological control.

benefits.title: Beneficial Mycorrhizal Network
benefits.message: 147 shared mycorrhizal fungal species connect 5 plants
benefits.detail: Shared mycorrhizal fungi create underground networks that facilitate nutrient exchange, water sharing, and chemical communication between plants.

benefits.title: High Structural Diversity
benefits.detail: Diverse plant structures create vertical stratification, maximizing space use, light capture, and habitat complexity.

benefits.title: Robust Pollinator Support
benefits.detail: Plants attract and support overlapping pollinator communities, ensuring reliable pollination services and promoting pollinator diversity.
